title: Bring ranked to ARAM
body: ARAM isn’t ranked, but I really wish Riot would have a  separate ranked mode designed around ARAM players.  Yea, that’s right, ranked in ARAM.  Why?  Because it takes a lot more skill to deal with the randomness, poor comps, carrying, and turning it around than picking a good comp, bans, and counter picks.  Some people want to main a few champs and get to gold or diamond, but I think it is time to bring a ranked mode to ARAM and get recognition to those players who are truly good with most or all champs.  On top of that, I’d like to see exclusive season end rewards for those who pour their hearts into ARAM and make it their main game.
